185736850.review:
[h1] 【元】スタイリッシュアクションゲーム [/h1]

5がやりたくて履修のつもりで手をつけましたが、今はもうアクションからシステムから何まで古臭くて無理です
このSE版ではなくオリジナルが発売された当初はアクションゲームとして優れた作品だったのかもしれません

今世代のアクションゲームには
・Bloodborne以降のソウルシリーズやそれに影響を受けたソウルライクアクションゲーム
・ゼンレスゾーンゼロ
などのハイクオリティなアクションゲームが揃っていて、比べるのは悪いですが現時点では出来たものじゃないです

[h1] 2015年発売ですよね？ [/h1]

2015年はBloodborne、ウィッチャー3、フォールアウト4など様々な次世代を担うゲームが発売された年です。
そんな年に
・カメラ固定（昔のバイオハザードをイメージしてください）
・ロックオンボタンを押し続けていないと繋がらないアクション
・PCへの最適化不足（ボーダレスもなければフルスクリーンもUWQDなどでは引き伸ばされて表示されます）

このような形で発売したのは信じがたいです。DMCファンなら買うだろうというカプコンの驕りですね

現在続々とバイオハザードがREリメイクされていますが、DMCもぜひ次のリメイク候補に上げていただきたいです

185506065.review:
Devil May Cry 4 Special Edition, rilasciato nel 2015, è un rifacimento del titolo originale pubblicato nel 2008. (giocato da me su console e recuperato di recente per pc).

Questo gioco mantiene la sua reputazione di action-adventure con un gameplay frenetico e uno stile visivo accattivante.

Tuttavia ho trovato questo titolo confusionario nelle sue dinamiche di gioco, obbligando il giocatore ad un continuo backtracking ed anche le combo sono più impegnative da padroneggiare.

Sebbene la narrativa sia interessante, alcune parti possono sembrare un po' slegate e meno coinvolgenti rispetto ad altri titoli della serie.

Di buono presenta l'introduzione di nuovi personaggi giocabili, come Vergil, Lady e Trish, ognuno con stili di combattimento distintivi. 

Questo arricchisce l'esperienza di gioco e offre nuove prospettive sulla storia.

Il sistema di combattimento è uno dei punti di forza del gioco. 

Con una varietà di armi e abilità, i giocatori possono personalizzare il proprio stile di combattimento, rendendo ogni incontro unico e coinvolgente.

In breve, titolo buono ma può dare a noia la minore intuitività ed il continuo avanti e indietro per completare le missioni.

Per i fan del genere Hack and Slash resta comunque consigliato. A me non ha convinto particolarmente.

185414177.review:
"Devil May Cry 4" is a dazzling showcase of stylish action, over-the-top characters, and intricate combat mechanics that have become the series’ hallmark. 
As the fourth entry in this iconic franchise, the game doesn’t just rest on the laurels of its predecessors, it injects fresh ideas into its demon-slaying formula, albeit with some noticeable missteps.
The narrative introduces a new protagonist, Nero, whose demon-infused arm, the Devil Bringer, is as intriguing as his fiery personality. 
While the plot occasionally dips into melodrama, the chemistry between Nero and Dante, along with its antagonists, keeps the story engaging enough to push you from one explosive set piece to the next.
But the real star of Devil May Cry 4 is its combat. 
Nero’s Devil Bringer adds a layer of strategic depth, allowing players to grapple enemies, unleash devastating combos, and interact with the environment in creative ways. 
Meanwhile, Dante’s return brings with it his signature style-switching system, enabling a fluid and customizable fighting experience.
However, the game’s second half is a glaring flaw. 
Retracing previously completed levels as Dante feels like padding, disrupting the otherwise exhilarating pacing. 
That said, the boss battles, from towering demons to grotesque monstrosities, remain a highlight, offering plenty of spectacle and challenge.
Even by today’s standards, Devil May Cry 4 holds up visually, with richly detailed environments and smooth animations. 
The gothic architecture of Fortuna City is both atmospheric and visually arresting. 
The soundtrack, an electrifying mix of metal and orchestral themes, perfectly complements the adrenaline-fueled combat, while the voice acting adds just the right amount of campy charm.
Devil May Cry 4 is a thrilling, albeit uneven, entry in the series. 
While Nero’s introduction breathes new life into the franchise and the combat is as addictive as ever, the recycled content in the latter half feels like a missed opportunity. 
Still, for fans of stylish action games, this is a devilish delight worth experiencing.

185404858.review:
Esta es la segunda vez que juego DMC 4, y la verdad lo disfruté igual que la primera vez. Los combos con Nero, aun siendo simples, son muy satisfactorios de hacer, sobre todo en el aire. Combinar la pistola con la espada en el aire y luego rematar con el brazo especial de Nero es muy gratificante.

En un momento dado del juego, juegas como Dante, cuya gran mejora está en sus estilos, ya que ahora se pueden cambiar en tiempo real. Esto hace que la cantidad de posibilidades en lo que respecta a los combos sea mayor. Como en el anterior DMC 3, Dante obtendrá armas cada vez que derrote a un jefe. Lamentablemente, esto no sucede con Nero, pero aun así el gameplay en general cumple muuuuuuuuy bien con lo que esperas de un DMC.

Tengo entendido que DMC 4 salió con varios problemas, ya que durante el desarrollo hubo inconvenientes en el equipo, lo que hizo que el juego recicle zonas y jefes. Pero, aun con esto, disfruté mucho el juego. Muy recomendado si te gustan los Hack and Slash. JUEGAZO

185387466.review:
【最初に】
windows10や11で起動しないと言うレビューが多数見受けられますが、それは少し間違った情報かもです。
OS云々ではなく、モニターとの相性ではないでしょうか？

最近TVを買い替えるまでは何も考えなくても普通に4Kで起動～プレイ可能でしたが、VRR対応のTVに買い替えた後に起動しなくなった・・・
G-SYNC対応のPCモニターでは問題なく起動できています。

バイナリーの書き換え対処方法の値を見た感じでも最終アプデ前のDirectX関連の互換性に関する値なのでは？

PCモニターやTVの信号設定が変更可能であれば一度設定を変えてみたら良いと思います。

TVのほうはブラビアとレグザ（どちらもVRR非対応品）の時は起動できてました。
色々設定を試した所、最近買ったTVではVRRを設定するために”高速信号モード”に設定していたのですが、これを”通常モード”に切り替えた所4K&144hzで起動できました。

【ゲームについて】
メインの主人公がダンテではなくネロになり悪魔システムも過去作品とは大きく異なります。
ただ、シーンによってダンテも使用可能ですので従来通りのアクションもプレイできます。

時間軸としましては３→１→２→４となり、普通に１→２→３とプレイしてきた方は脳内洗脳されていて気づかない方も多いとは思いますが、本来ダンテは3の陽気でお茶らけた性格から大人になるにつれ落ち着いた性格になっていき、2ではクールな大人に成長した設定の性格のはずが、４のダンテは３のダンテがそのまま大人になった感じの性格なので発売当時は「2のダンテは何処へ？？」な感じになりました；
※4のダンテはダンテらしくて好きですけど；
※DMCデビルメイクライはストーリー的には3のさらに前ですが、あれは個人的に認めていないので除外；

ストーリーも１～5まで登場人物や名前だけのキャラ等全て繋がっているので単発作品でプレイしないで通しでナンバリングをプレイして欲しいですね。
※今の所２だけはプレイしなくても良いです。

オリジナルの発売当初は9800GTXとかじゃないと60FPSでプレイできない程に重かった作品ですが、今の現行PCであれば余程の低スペックでない限りは大丈夫です。

185292255.review:
Terminado y satisfecho. El salto que tuvo del 1 al 4 siendo que los he jugado casi seguidos hasta ahora ha sido notorio. No recordaba bien la historia del 4 pero si como se veía en gameplay, y es alucinante. Sigue tratando de mejorar aspectos de los anteriores juegos que ya forman la base de lo que es un Devil May Cry, Ya sea la música, la personalidad de sus protagonistas, en este caso con Nero y un poco con Dante, las mecánicas, que sentí una mejoría en el sentido de gustarme más la idea de mantener los combos y seguir peleando. Con Nero, sobre todo, se siente bien jugar con él. 

En cuanto a la historia, no es mala pero tampoco buena, sobre todo por el backtracking del final que tienes que hacer con Dante siendo que combates contra los mismos jefes, vas por los mismos escenarios y los mismos enemigos. No soy de criticar los escenarios y su interconexión en los juegos, pero en este caso particular si me sentí un tanto desubicado por qué avanzabas a tal zona (al inicio con Nero de hecho).

En cuanto a lo que espero de un DMC, cumplió con su cometido, porque me divertí jugando, ya que, como dije anteriormente, mejora este juego la satisfacción de hacer combos, usar tus armas, cambiarlas constantemente, mantener el combo, esquivar, todo ello se mejora y me sentí a gusto con mi experiencia jugando.

Sin más, The Devil´s Never Cry!

185066222.review: Świetna gra, mimo że mija jej już 10 lat to wciąż jest warto w nią zagrać, trochę się pogubiłem gdzieniegdzie, trochę mało rodzajów przeciwników chociaż się tego w ogóle nie czuje w trakcie gry. Sterowanie - jak ktoś ma za sobą piątkę, to nie powinien zobaczyć zbytniej różnicy. Cutscenki są super. Jakoś ta grafika zbytnio nie odstaje nawet w dzisiejszych czasach, bo gier z niesamowitą grafiką jak w remakach residentów jest stosunkowo mało, a jednak w to się po prostu dobrze gra (przez większość czasu). Jest Vergil i granie nim jest przepiękne. Gdybym wiedział o tej grze w 2015 to byłby to dla mnie taki sam szok jak granie w DMC5. Nie wiem jak ludziom ta gra się może nie podobać i dlaczego jest tak źle wspominana wszędzie, dla mnie jest cudowna. Nie rozumiem czy Capcom wyprzedza czasy, w których ich gry powstają czy po prostu nikt poza nimi nie potrafi zrobić nic kreatywnego. Autentycznie lepiej bawiłem się grając w DMC4 niż w większość gier w jakie grałem, chciałem zagrać w coś podobnego do DMC5 i dostałem. Te dwie gry są do siebie tak bardzo zbliżone sterowaniem, że nawet nie poczułem większej różnicy. Jest to dosłownie uczucie jakby wsiąść do wehikułu czasu i zagrać w to samo tylko trochę lat wstecz gdy technologia nie pozwalała na wiele rzeczy (i tak Vergil i Yamato obchodzą technologię, a judgment cut'y w cutscenkach wyglądają jak wyjęte z przyszłości). Szkoda mi trochę, że tak późno dowiedziałem się o Devil May Cry'iach i że tak późno zdecydowałem się zagrać też w poprzednie części, bo zrobiłby na mnie jeszcze większe wrażenie i ogrywał bym tę część tak samo jak DMC5, a potem DMC5 gdyby już wyszło, a tak grając wstecz, nie chcę mi się grać we wszystkie tryby, bo jakby już w nie grałem w lepszej wersji. No ale wciąż ta gra jest niesamowita, cieszę się, że w nią zagrałem <3

Dmc3 ile "sıkıcı oyun" sorununu aştıklarını düşünmüştüm yanılmışım. Bu oyundan kaç yıl önce çıkmış ilk oyunun verdiği keyif bile bu oyunu eziyor. Bölüm tasarımları berbat ve bitirmesi çok uzun sürüyor. Kendisini tekrar eden yapıda olduğundan dolayı hemen bayıyor, oynamaya devam edesim gelmiyor. Başarısız bir oyun.

Ek olarak sorunlu bir port. Tam ekran modu buglu. Oyunu tam ekran yapınca steam fonksiyonlarını kullanamıyorum. Shift+tab yapınca açılan steam overlayi gözükmüyor, başarım bildirimleri gözükmüyor. Ayrıca belli noktalarda oyun durduk yere çöküyor. Forumlarda gezindim çıktığından beri böyleymiş hiç umursamamışlar bile.

184700407.review:
일단 돈받고 산 게임이 실행조차 안되는게 유감입니다.
저는 아래의 작업후에야 게임을 할 수 있었습니다.

- Steamless 다운
- HxD 다운
- 설치폴더 이동후 실행파일 steamless에서 언팩.
- 게임 폴더에 나온 언팩파일을 헥스에디터에서 불러옵니다
- CTRL+G로 6790E7 "Offset" 값을 찾아주세요
- 80 02 00 00 값이 나오면  02를 07로 변경해주세요
- 변경후 다른 이름으로 저장을 하시면서 기존 실행파일을 덮어씌어주세요
- 이제 게임이 실행 됩니다.

이 작업을 마쳐도 인게임에서 설정에 들어가면 또 프로그램이 꺼지는 오류가 있었습니다.
이 경우 NVDIA 앱을 설치해주시고 해당 앱의 라이브러리에서 게임을 실행해주세요.
그러면 설정 진입이 가능해집니다.

라이브러리에 DMC시리즈를 다 모으고 싶어서 샀지만
이렇게까지 해야하는지는 많이 어이가 없습니다

184584078.review:
I am very conflicted on how I feel about this game. Nero did not feel great to control, his combat felt very clunky and it did not feel like I could sustain combos across enemies due to limited movement options. Dante felt way better to control due to more weapons but still had same issues as Nero. Aerial combos for both felt pretty limited and non existent. The game just felt very slow to play and a lot of the enemies can easily break your combos which does not help either. 

But without going into a ton of detail, you can tell this game was not completed in the vision sense. There was a lot of repeated boss fights, and retreading. There wasn't a ton of diversity in the soundtrack, just felt like 1-2 songs on repeat. And nothing really happens in the story. Cutscenes were great like always, a lot of funny and over the top moments you would expect from DMC.

Happy to report it works flawlessly on both CachyOS and SteamOS (used Proton 9.0.3). Ran into one issue where if the game resolution was set to 4K, the game wouldn't boot. If you go into the game's config, and set it to 1080p, it will boot again.

At the end of the day, I'd say its probably a 6-7/10 and worth checking out when on sale.

Bit repetitive it same missions and boss fights 3x times BUT definitely a recommended purchase on sale.

184536360.review:
起動直後にクラッシュしてしまうため、プレイできません。

PC Gaming Wikiによると、WQHD、4Kなど、FullHD(1920x1080)より大きい解像度のモニタを使用しているとクラッシュしてしまうらしいです。
実行ファイル(.exe)をバイナリエディタで編集すればプレイできるようですが、
起動できるようにすることに手間がかかる必要がある時点で、購入はオススメできません。

発売から今年で10年にもなる古いタイトルですが、4KはともかくWQHDは今日では特段珍しい解像度でもないので、このまま販売を続けるつもりなら現代のPCでも起動できるように対応していただきたいところです。

184413923.review:
I had no idea this game got a lot of hate... But honestly, I fucking love it. I beat it, finished it, did Vergil and am currently trying to do bloody palace, and long story short... Its good.

Only note worthy issue: I came here wanting to play as Dante, but was stuck with new guy instead. He felt off at the start, but the more I learned about him, the more fun I had. Every enemy so meticulously desinged around his kit, even his individual sword combos, it was so fucking good.

Dante... By the time you get to him, he's a beast. Strong, and with enough red orbs to unlock everything you need.
I hear that in DMD difficulty he kind of sucks, since enemies were designed around Nero and not dante, but I can't honestly say much on this since I haven't done DMD.
I also fucking love trish and Lady, even if their gameplay is a bit more lackluster. Well, I say this but trish is basically just a simpler version of DMC 3 Dante. So I cant complain much

Overall... Fucking get this game. And if its on discount, you're commiting a crime by not getting it and I will personally find where you live, chain you to your chair, and make you beat this game if you don't buy it.

184142321.review:
Lady/Trish ile başlayarak doğru bir seçim yaptığımı düşünüyorum yoksa öbür türlü Vergil seçip oyun sonuna kadar aynı karakterle devam etmek büyük olasılıkla canımı sıkardı.
Oyunun başları sürekli aynı komboları yapmaktan biraz sıkıldım ancak yeterince sabredip Trish'e geçince oyun daha da bir güzelleşti hem efektler açısından hem de komboların özgünlüğü, hissiyatı vb.
Hikaye kısmına gelirsek hiçbir şey anlamadım oyunu oynadıkça az buçuk kendimce bir şeyler oluşturdum ama oyunda öyle bir tanıtım vb. yoktu.
Ses tasarımı açısından genel olarak öyle aklımda kalan çok da iyiydi diyebileceğim bir ses yoktu ancak bu demek değil ki oyunun sesleri oyuna uygun değil. Mesela başka bir DMC oyunun Never Surrender ve No Redemption adlı soundtrackleri aklımda kalmıştı. Yine aynı şekilde buna benzer böyle savaşa daha uygun ya da hype yaratan sesler kullanılabilirdi.
Level/Mekan tasarımı açısından herhangi bir problemimiz yok öyle çok karma karışık bir map olayı yok gayet net ve nasıl ilerlemen gerektiğin belli ve de konsepte uygun modellemeler yapılmış.
Genel olarak biraz sabırlıysanız ve de Castlevania Lords of the Shadow 2 tarzı oyunlar seviyorsanız DMC'yi de seveceğinizi düşünüyorum.

184059882.review:
DMC4:SE is a great game. Mostly. 

The good: 
- Excellent combat and gameplay patterns that reward analysis, experimentation, and skill.
- A fun and fast paced story that doesn't get in the way, complete with classic DMC wackiness. 
- Slick character and enemy designs that hold up despite the game's age. 

The bad: 
- An obnoxious amount of loading screens. This is made worse because of the...
- Maze levels... so many maze levels. Prepare to run back and forth between rooms you've already been to, complete with loading screens each way.
- The camera can be absolutely horrendous, like a nightmare of perspective born from the early Resident Evil games mixed with a fever dream by Salvador Dali. This is most damning in the Secret Missions, which are short challenges that reward powerful life and spirit upgrades. When platforming, judging distance, and timing are critical for success, a camera that switches viewpoints (and thus reverses your directional inputs) every other step is the worst kind of frustrating.  

The deep, expressive combat and the camp charm significantly outweigh these negatives, but overall, this is a fun, but flawed experience.

183712717.review: Pretty good! It's one of my favorites in the franchise, though I'm biased because I love Nero. Unfortunately, I had to rollback the game to a working version which isn't great but whatever. The game works on PS3& PS4 if your PC just wont load it and you're REALLY that desperate to play it. I would only recommend if you're willing to put in a few extra minutes fixing the game because it crashes on a lot of modern PCs and you are in it for the story/combat. Dante's missions are literally just heading backwards from Nero's so have fun with that lolol. The story is pretty good, I think Kyrie and Nero are so sweet! Nero's combat is fun (I LOVE his sick ass demon arm) and Dante is great as always. playable Lady and Trish is also a nice touch, but i wish they had their own stories. It was disappointing that Vergil, Trish, and Lady were just replacing characters instead of having their own cut-scenes or accounts of the events. :( The most annoying things are the candy land dice games but this game has a place dear in my heart. I would definitely play DMC1/DMC3 to start the series if you're really thinking of getting into the franchise. :)

183625662.review:
um jogaço, Nero foi uma excelente adição a franquia e é bem divertido jogar com ele. Apesar disso, eu tenho algumas ressalvas; senti falta de mais participação da Lady e Trish (na campanha principal do Nero e Dante), a campanha é quase que completamente reciclada quando chega a hora de jogarmos com o Dante, com apenas algumas poucas alterações e eu não poderia esquecer do boss final: 

Deixando pra trás toda a formalidade, aquele véio caduco dos infernos é um pé no teu saco, ele não é necessariamente difícil, na verdade o que torna ele chato é o fato de ele esquivar mais que o próprio jogador, ele te faz passar tanta raiva que pra fazer ele sem item tem que ter uma caixa de calmante do lado da tua mesa. Se dentro na sua caixola ainda resta um pouco de amor a vida e a virtude da paciência, pega todas as preciosas red orbs que você guardou até então e gaste em água benta, não perca seu tempo com aquele pedaço de pele flácida covarde

apesar disso, devil may cry 4 é um excelente jogo, o combate é divertido e bonito de assistir, os bosses são bem criativos (com exceção do velho da ordem da paumolecencia) e o fato de você poder alternar entre os estilos do Dante no meio da luta deixa o jogo bem mais fluido. O devil bringer de Nero é um diferencial excepcional para o jogo puxar os inimigos rumo a sua perdição faz juz ao nome "devil may cry", apesar de que o demônio morre antes mesmo de ter tempo para chorar
